meanings.sent1: The football player was concussing his opponent during the game.
meanings.sent2: The doctor warned about the dangers of concussing the brain with rough sports.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy magician ended up concussing himself with his failed magic trick.
meanings.sent4: The loud music was concussing my ears, making it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The hammer concussing the nail into the wood echoed through the workshop.
